data.title: Christina Milian: Even Beautiful Women Get Cheated On | Essence
data.meta_description: The singer talks about her divorce, and being cheated on.
data.text:
Beauty and brains won’t save you from a cheating spouse. That’s one lesson singer Christina Milian learned from her 10-month long marriage to producer, Terius “The Dream” Nash.

The singer got up close and personal on actress Niecy Nash’s new Yahoo web series, “Let’s Talk About Love.”

“Beautiful has nothing to do with [getting cheated on],” she says. “Know I’m a really good wife, I’m a really good girlfriend,” she adds. “I know we’re all supposed to take blame for certain things, but I have to say I’m pretty good at all those things.”

PHOTOS: Celeb Moms: Christina Milian

Milian divorced “The Dream” in late 2010 after he was caught frolicking on the beach with his assistant — just months after she gave birth to their daughter Violet. Milian eventually received a $4M divorce settlement.

PHOTOS: Christina Milian’s Makeup Evolution

Now happily single, and splitting custody of Violet, Milian admits the biggest lesson she’s learned is not to get overtaken by love. “Sometimes we get so carried away with love. We might even mistake somethings like lust.”

As soon as her divorce was finalized Milian was quoted saying “I feel brand new. I’m stronger for it and now I’m ready for the next phase of my life.”
